content:
Restaurant Schloss Lenzburg offers a range of Swiss and international cuisine, but some of their famous dishes that you should try include:

1. Rindfleisch - An authentic Swiss dish made with beef, butter, and mushrooms in a cream sauce. 2. Wiener Schnitzel - A traditional Austrian dish that is popular throughout Switzerland. It is made with breaded veal, served with potato salad, and a cranberry garnish. 3. Spargel - Asparagus is usually served with potatoes and a sauce Hollandaise in Switzerland. 4. Züricher Geschnetzeltes - A Swiss specialty that originated in Zurich. Its main ingredient is diced veal, combined with mushrooms and a creamy sauce served with Rösti. 5. Cheese Fondue - The dish which is a symbol of Swiss cuisine. Bread is dipped in a skillet of melted cheese, and sometimes seasoned or flavored. Restaurant Schloss Lenzburg uses fresh and seasonal ingredients for their dishes, so you can try some new and tasty variants of your favorite Swiss dishes.
